Verses: 1 aarunaalaikkup Pinbu, Yesu Pedhuruvaiyum Yaakkopaiyum Avanudaiya Sagodharanaagiya Yovaanaiyum Koottikkondu Thaniththirukkumpadi Uyarndha Malaiyinmel Poi,
2 avargalukku Munpaaga Maruroopamaanaar; Avar Mugam Sooriyanaippolap Piragaasiththadhu, Avar Vasthiram Velichchaththaippola Venmaiyaayitru.
3 appozhudhu Moseyum, Eliyaavum Avarode Pesugiravargalaaga Avargalukkuk Kaanappattaargal.

4 appozhudhu Pedhuru Yesuvai Nokki: Aandavare, Naam Inge Irukkiradhu Nalladhu; Umakkuch Siththamaanaal, Inge Umakku Oru Koodaaramum, Mosekku Oru Koodaaramum, Eliyaavukku Oru Koodaaramumaaga, Moondru Koodaarangalaip Poduvom Endraan.

5 avan Pesugaiyil, Idho, Oliyulla Oru Megam Avargalmel Nizhalittadhu. Ivar Ennudaiya Nesa Kumaaran, Ivaril Piriyamaayirukkiren, Ivarukku Sevikodungal Endru Andha Megaththilirundhu Oru Saththam Undaayitru.
6 seeshargal Adhaikkettu, Mugankuppura Vizhundhu, Migavum Payandhaargal.
7 appozhudhu, Yesu Vandhu, Avargalaith Thottu: Ezhundhirungal Payappadaadheyungal Endraar.
8 avargal Thangal Kangalai Ereduththuppaarkkaiyil Yesuvaiththavira Veroruvaraiyum Kaanavillai.
9 avargal Malaiyilirundhu Irangukirapodhu, Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Manushakumaaran Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhirukkumvaraikkum Indhath Tharisanaththai Oruvarukkum Sollavendaam Endru Kattalaiyittaar.
10 appozhudhu, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avarai Nokki: Appadiyaanaal Eliyaa Mundhivaravendum Endru Vedhapaarakar Sollugiraargale, Adheppadi Yendru Kettaargal.
11 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Eliyaa Mundhi Vandhu Ellaavatraiyum Seerppaduththuvadhu Meydhaan.
12 aanaalum, Eliyaa Vandhaayitru Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren; Avanai Ariyaamal Thangal Ishtappadi Avanukkuch Seydhaargal; Ivvidhamaai Manushakumaaranum Avargalaal Paadupaduvaar Endraar.
13 avar Yovaan Snaananaikkuriththuth Thangalukku Sonnaar Endru Appozhudhu Avargal Arindhukondaargal.
14 avargal Janangalidaththil Vandhapodhu, Oru Manushan Avaridaththil Vandhu, Avar Munbaaga Muzhangaalpadiyittu:
15 aandavare, En Maganukku Irangum, Avan Sandhirarogiyaaik Kodiya Vedhanaippadugiraan; Adikkadi Theeyilum, Adikkadi Jalaththilum Vizhugiraan.
16 avanai Ummudaiya Seeshargalidaththil Konduvandhen; Avanai Sosthamaakka Avargalaal Koodaamarpoyitru Endraan.

17 yesu Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Visuvaasamillaadha Maarupaadulla Sandhadhiye, Edhuvaraikkum Naan Ungalodu Iruppen? Edhuvaraikkum Ungalidaththil Porumaiyaayiruppen? Avanai Ennidaththil Konduvaarungal Endraar.
18 yesu Pisaasai Adhattinaar; Udane Adhu Avanai Vittup Purappattadhu; Annerame Andha Ilaignan Sosthamaanaan.
19 appozhudhu, Seeshargal Yesuvinidaththil Thaniththu Vandhu: Adhaith Thuraththivida Engalaal En Koodaamarpoyitru Endru Kettaargal.

20 adharku Yesu: Ungal Avisuvaasaththinaaledhaan; Kaduguvidhaiyalavu Visuvaasam Ungalukku Irundhaal Neengal Indha Malaiyaippaarththu, Ivvidam Vittu Appurampo Endru Solla Adhu Appuram Pom; Ungalaal Koodaatha Kaariyam Ondrumiraadhu Endru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
21 indha Jaadhippisaasu Jebaththinaalum Ubavaasaththinaalumeyandri Matrevvidhaththinaalum Purappattuppogaadhu Endraar.
22 avargal Galileyaavile Sanjarikkumpodhu, Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Manushakumaaran Manushar Kaigalil Oppukkodukkappaduvaar.
23 avargal Avaraikkolai Seyvaargal; Aagilum Moondraam Naalile Uyirththezhundhiruppaar Endraar. Avargal Migundha Thukkamadaindhaargal.
24 avargal Kapparnakoomil Vandhapodhu, Varippanam Vaangukiravargal Pedhuruvinidaththil Vandhu: Ungal Podhagar Varippanam Seluththugiradhillaiyaa Endru Kettaargal; Seluththugiraar Endraan.

25 avan Veettirkul Vandhapodhu, Avan Pesugiradharku Munname Yesu Avanai Nokki: Seemone, Unakku Eppadith Thondrugiradhu? Boomiyin Raajaakkal Theervaiyaiyum Variyaiyum Thangal Pillaigalidaththilo, Anniyaridaththilo, Yaaridaththil Vaangukiraargal Endru Kettaar.
26 adharkup Pedhuru: Anniyaridaththil Vaangukiraargal Endraan. Yesu Avanai Nokki: Appadiyaanaal Pillaigal Adhai Seluththavenduvadhillaiye.

27 aagilum, Naam Avargalukku Idaralaayiraadhapadikku, Nee Kadalukkuppoi, Thoondil Pottu, Mudhalaavadhu Agappadukira Meenaippidiththu, Adhan Vaayaith Thirandhupaar. Oru Vellippanaththaik Kaanpaai; Adhai Eduththu Enakkaagavum Unakkaagavum Avargalidaththil Kodu Endraar.
